events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on the highway at approximately 7:45 PM involving their sedan and another vehicle.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' based on the keywords reported in the initial filing regarding vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to handle the claim promptly and guide the customer through the process.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of their auto accident claim and outlining the next steps for processing.
Requested police report, vehicle damage photos, and driver's license copies necessary to validate the details of the car accident claim.
Customer uploaded required documents including police report and images of the damaged vehicle for review by the claims department.
Initiated investigation to assess the cause of the vehicle collision and verify all submitted evidence regarding the auto accident.
The investigative team completed their assessment confirming details of the accident and verifying the validity of the claim.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer outlining compensation for vehicle repairs and associated damages from the collision.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the offer and the claims process thus far.
The auto accident claim has been officially approved after final review of all documentation and acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment for the approved claim was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover the vehicle repair costs.
The claim file was closed following payment issuance and confirmation from the customer that all damages were satisfactorily resolved.
